autocompleteSubmitMessage.description: Message shown at the bottom of autocomplete menu.

contextMenuFillAttribute.description: Context menu parent item for filling a custom attribute.

contextMenuFillPassword.description: Context menu item for filling password.

contextMenuFillTOTP.description: Context menu item for filling Time-based One Time Password.

contextMenuFillUsernameAndPassword.description: Context menu item for filling both username and password.

contextMenuSaveCredentials.description: Save credentials using the credential banner.

contextMenuShowPasswordGeneratorIcons.description: Show password generator icon on every password input field.

credentialExpired.description: If a credential is expired, this is appended to the title label.

credentialsMultipleFound.description: Alert message when trying to fill username and/or password when multiple credentials are found.
credentialsMultipleFound.message: Lebih dari satu login ditemukan di KeePassXC!

credentialsMultipleFoundSecondLine.description: Alert message when trying to fill username and/or password when multiple credentials are found.
credentialsMultipleFoundSecondLine.message: Klik ikon KeePassXC-Browser untuk opsi lainnya.

credentialsNoLoginsFound.description: Shown when no credentials are found for the current page.

credentialsNoTOTPFound.description: Alert message when no TOTP is found.

credentialsNoUsername.description: Shown when no username is set in the credentials.

credentialsNoUsernameFound.description: Alert message when no credentials are found for the given username.
credentialsNoUsernameFound.message: Tidak ditemukan kredensial untuk nama pengguna yang dimaksud.

defineAgain.description: Again button text when choosing custom login fields.

defineAlreadySelected.description: A text shown when custom credentials fields are already set for the page.
defineAlreadySelected.message: Ruas masuk untuk halaman ini sudah dipilih dan akan ditimpa ulang.

defineChoosePassword.description: Choosing a password field text when choosing custom login fields.

defineChooseTOTP.description: Choosing a TOTP field text when choosing custom login fields.

defineChooseUsername.description: Choosing a username field text when choosing custom login fields.

defineConfirm.description: Confirm button text when choosing custom login fields.

defineConfirmSelection.description: Confirm a selection text when choosing custom login fields.

defineDiscard.description: Discard selection button text when choosing custom login fields.

defineDismiss.description: Dismiss button text when choosing custom login fields.

defineHelpText.description: Confirm a selection text when choosing custom login fields which contains string fields.
defineHelpText.message: Harap konfirmasi pilihan Anda atau pilih lebih banyak bidang sebagai bidang String.

defineKeyboardText.message: Anda juga dapat menggunakan angka untuk memilih bidang input dari keyboard.

defineMore.description: More button text when choosing custom login fields.

defineSkip.description: Skip button text when choosing custom login fields.

errorMessageEncrypt.message: Enskripsi pesan gagal. Apakah KeePassXC sudah berjalan?

errorMessageSavedDatabases.message: Tidak ada basisdata tersimpan yang ditemukan.

errorMessageTimeout.description: Cannot connect to KeePassXC. Check that browser integration is enabled in KeePassXC settings.
errorMessageTimeout.message: Tidak dapat terhubung ke KeePassXC. Periksa apakah integrasi browser diaktifkan di pengaturan KeePassXC.

errorNotConnected.description: Error notification shown when not connected to KeePassXC

extensionDescription.message: Integrasi KeePassXC untuk peramban web modern

fieldsFill.description: Alert message when no fields are found to fill in.
fieldsFill.message: Error: Tidak dapat menemukan bidang yang harus diisi.

fieldsNoPasswordField.description: Message shown when no password fields are found.
fieldsNoPasswordField.message: Error: Tidak dapat menemukan bidang kata sandi.

httpAuthDialog.description: Options page HTTP Basic Auth dialog text

multipleCredentialsDetected.description: Notification when HTTP Authentication has multiple credentials detected.
multipleCredentialsDetected.message: Mendeteksi otentikasi HTTP dengan beberapa kredensial. Klik pada ikon ekstensi untuk memilih kredensial yang benar.

optionsAboutChrome.description: About page link to Chrome Web Store.
optionsAboutChrome.message: Visit KeePassXC-Browser in the Chrome Web Store.

optionsAboutCreateNewIssue.description: Link text for creating a new issue.

optionsAboutDebugInfo.message: The following debug info can be used

optionsAboutExtensionVersion.description: About page text of extension version.

optionsAboutKeePassXCVersion.description: About page text of KeePassXC version.

optionsAboutMozilla.message: Visit KeePassXC-Browser in the Mozilla Add-ons directory.

optionsAboutReportBugs.description: About page text of reporting bugs.

optionsAdvancedSettingsTitle.description: Advanced settings title in settings page

optionsAutoFillAndSendHelpText.description: Auto-Fill And Send option help text.
optionsAutoFillAndSendHelpText.message: If credentials are found for a page and the login-type is an HTTP Basic Auth request, KeePassXC-Browser tries to login automatically with the first given credentials. When multiple credentials are present, the extension popup can be used to choose the correct one. Even when this feature is enabled, it is still possible to enter HTTP Basic Auth login manually.

optionsAutoFillAndSendHelpTextSecond.description: HTTP Basic Auth image help text.
optionsAutoFillAndSendHelpTextSecond.message: An HTTP Basic Auth dialog looks like this:

optionsAutoFillSingleEntryHelpText.description: Auto-Fill Single Entry option help text.
optionsAutoFillSingleEntryHelpText.message: Let KeePassXC-Browser automatically fill in credentials if it receives only a single entry.

optionsAutoFillSingleEntryWarning.message: Warning! Using auto-fill is not safe. Use at your own risk.

optionsAutoRetrieveCredentialsHelpText.message: KeePassXC-Browser will immediately retrieve credentials when a tab is activated.

optionsAutoSubmitHelpText.message: Automatically submits selected credentials. This is disabled for single entry auto-fill.

optionsAutocompleteUsernamesHelpText.message: Show a dropdown list containing available credentials for all username fields on a page.

optionsAutomaticReconnectHelpText.message: Reconnects automatically to KeePassXC when it is detected.

optionsAutomaticReconnectWarning.message: Warning! This feature is experimental. Use at your own risk.

optionsButtonCancel.description: Cancel button text when removing database key or custom login fields.

optionsButtonRemoveNow.description: Confirm button text when removing database key or custom login fields.

optionsButtonReset.description: Reset button text for keyboard shortcuts.

optionsCheckboxAutoCompleteUsernames.description: Activate autocomplete for username fields checkbox text.

optionsCheckboxAutoFillAndSend.description: Auto fill HTTP Basic Auth dialogs and send them checkbox text.
optionsCheckboxAutoFillAndSend.message: Automatically fill in HTTP Basic Auth dialogs and submit them.

optionsCheckboxAutoFillSingleEntry.description: Automatically fill-in single credential entry checkbox text.

optionsCheckboxOTPIcons.description: Activate OTP field icons textbox text.

optionsCheckboxShowGroupNameInAutocomple.description: Show group name in autocomplete checkbox text.

optionsCheckboxShowLoginNotifications.message: Show a banner on the page when new credentials can be saved to the database.

optionsCheckboxUsePasswordGenerator.description: Activate password generator icons checkbox text.

optionsCheckboxUsernameIcons.description: Activate username field icons textbox text.

optionsClearCredentialsTimeout.message: Clear credentials from non-active tabs after (seconds, 0-3600).

optionsClearCredentialsTimeoutHelpText.message: Credentials are cleared from background tabs after the timeout and permissions for those pages will be asked again.

optionsConfigureShortcuts.description: Keyboard shortcut button and title text.

optionsDatabasesRemoveIdentifierConfirmS.message: Anda dapat menghubungkan kembali basis data anda kapan saja.

optionsErrorValueExists.message: The value already exists in the list.

optionsLabelDefaultGroup.message: Grup baku untuk menyimpan sandi baru:

optionsLabelDefaultGroupCheckboxText.message: Selalu bertanya dimana menyimpan kredensial baru

optionsSaveDomainOnlyCustomLoginHelpText.message: When saving new custom login fields, save only the domain instead of full URL.

optionsSaveDomainOnlyHelpText.message: When saving new credentials, save only the domain instead of full URL.

optionsSavingCredentialsTitle.description: Saving credentials title in settings page

optionsShortcutsDanger.description: Error message for changing keyboard shortcuts.

optionsShortcutsInfo.description: Info message for changing keyboard shortcuts.

optionsShortcutsSuccess.description: Message for successful keyboard shortcut change.

optionsShowGroupNameInAutocompleteHelpTe.description: Show group name in autocomplete help text.
optionsShowGroupNameInAutocompleteHelpTe.message: When credentials are returned from different groups, the group name will be shown.

optionsShowLoginFormIconHelpText.description: Username field icon option help text.
optionsShowLoginFormIconHelpText.message: Adds an icon to username fields for filling credentials with a single mouse click.

optionsShowNotificationsHelpText.message: Show notifications for errors and when user interaction is required.

optionsShowOTPIconHelpText.description: OTP field icon option help text.
optionsShowOTPIconHelpText.message: Adds an icon to input fields that are recognized as OTP/2FA.

optionsSitePreferencesConfirmation.description: Confirmation text when removing site from site preferences.
optionsSitePreferencesConfirmation.message: Do you really want to remove the specified site from the list: $1

optionsSitePreferencesConfirmationHelpTe.description: Part of confirmation text when removing site preferences.
optionsSitePreferencesConfirmationHelpTe.message: KeePassXC-Browser will enable all features for this site and remove username-only detection.

optionsSitePreferencesManualAddHelp.description: Help text for adding site manually on Site preferences tab.
optionsSitePreferencesManualAddHelp.message: The URL must start with either https://, http://, or ftp:// and must be at least 10 characters long.

optionsSitePreferencesManualAddText.description: Label for adding site manually on Site preferences tab.

optionsSitePreferencesNotFound.description: Shown when no site preferences are saved.

optionsSitePreferencesRemove.description: Confirmation text when removing ignored sites from the list.

optionsSitePreferencesSelect.description: Title text of select element in Site Preferences.
optionsSitePreferencesSelect.message: Option to ignore extension features for the page.

optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextFirst.description: Site preferences info text, first part.
optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextFirst.message: Sites on this page have special handling methods associated with them.

optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextFourth.description: Site preferences info text, fourth part.
optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextFourth.message: Username-only detection allows KeePassXC-Browser to fill in login details on websites with separate pages for username and password.

optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextSecond.description: Site preferences info text, second part.
optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextSecond.message: To ignore new/modified credentials on a specific site, add them below or when using the credential banner on the page select Don't ask again for this site.

optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextThird.description: Site preferences info text, third part.
optionsSitePreferencesTabHelpTextThird.message: If a site is fully ignored (Disable all features is selected), then the plugin will do nothing when visiting that site.

optionsSitePreferencesTableCaption.description: Table caption of Site Preferences page.
optionsSitePreferencesTableCaption.message: You can manage saved site preferences using the table.

optionsSortByGroupAndTitle.desription: Sort matching credentials by group and title option selection.

optionsSortByGroupAndUsername.desription: Sort matching credentials by group and username option selection.

optionsSortByTitle.desription: Sort matching credentials by title option selection.

optionsSortByUsername.desription: Sort matching credentials by username option selection.

optionsUseObserver.description: Use dynamic input field detection checkbox text.

optionsUseObserverHelpText.description: Use dynamic input field detection help text.
optionsUseObserverHelpText.message: Useful with pages that use popups or dynamic dialogs. Disable the feature to reduce CPU load on slower machines. When disabled credentials can be only inserted using keyboard shortcuts, the context menu or the extension popup.

optionsUsePasswordGeneratorHelpText.message: Adds an icon to password fields for generating a new password.

optionsUsePasswordGeneratorHelpTextSecon.description: Password Generator option help text, second part.
optionsUsePasswordGeneratorHelpTextSecon.message: Passwords are generated by KeePassXC using your password generation profile.

optionsUsePredefinedSitesHelpText.description: Use predefined sites option help text.
optionsUsePredefinedSitesHelpText.message: Adds common sites that have username-only login forms to the site preferences.

optionsUserInterfaceTitle.description: User interface title in settings page

optionsVersionDownload.message: Anda dapat mengunduh versi stabil terbaru dari $1

optionsVersionInfoText.message: KeePassXC-Browser needs KeePassXC to retrieve credentials.

optionsVersionRunning.description: Settings page info text of user's KeePassXC version.

passwordGeneratorCopy.description: Copy button text in password generator.

passwordGeneratorError.description: Password generator error text when KeePassXC is closed.

passwordGeneratorErrorIsRunning.description: Password generator error text when KeePassXC is closed.
passwordGeneratorErrorIsRunning.message: Apakah KeePassXC telah berjalan dan tersambung?

passwordGeneratorErrorTooLong.description: A warning text shown in the password generator.
passwordGeneratorErrorTooLong.message: Galat: Sandi yang dibuat melebihi panjang maksimum yang diizinkan!

passwordGeneratorErrorTooLongCut.description: A warning text shown in the password generator.
passwordGeneratorErrorTooLongCut.message: Itu telah dipotong untuk menyesuaikan dengan panjangnya

passwordGeneratorErrorTooLongRemember.message: Harap ingat kata sandi yang baru!

passwordGeneratorTryAgain.description: Generate button text in password generator when not connected.

popupAuthText.description: A popup message shown when doing HTTP Authentication with multiple credentials present.
popupAuthText.message: Select the login information you would like to get logged in with.

popupButtonClose.description: Close button text in popup or in notification.

popupButtonDismissHttpAuth.message: Tutup dan tampilkan dialog otentikasi bawaan

popupButtonIgnore.description: Ignore button text in popup or in notification when updating credentials.
popupButtonIgnore.message: Jangan tanya lagi untuk situs ini

popupButtonUpdate.description: Update button text in popup when updating credentials.

popupConfiguredAndAssociated.description: A popuo message when a connection to KeePassXC is succesful.
popupConfiguredAndAssociated.message: KeePassXC-Browser terhubung ke KeePassXC dan telah dikonfigurasi menggunakan pengidentifikasi berikut: $1

popupConfiguredNotAssociated.description: A popup message shown when KeePassXC is not connected but configured.
popupConfiguredNotAssociated.message: KeePassXC-Browser belum terhubung ke KeePassXC tetapi telah dikonfigurasi menggunakan pengidentifikasi: $1

popupDownloadNewVersion.description: Popup warning message link when KeePassXC version is not up-to-date.
popupDownloadNewVersion.message: Silakan unduh versi terbaru dari keepassxc.org

popupErrorEncountered.description: A text shown above error message in the popup.

popupFilterText.description: Text for login credentials quick filter.

popupLoginText.description: A popup message shown when one or multiple credentials are present.
popupLoginText.message: Pilih informasi login yang ingin anda sematkan ke dalam halaman.

popupMultiplePasswordFields.description: A popup message shown when web page has multiple password fields.
popupMultiplePasswordFields.message: More than one password field found on this page. Right-click one of the password fields, and choose one of:

popupNeedReconfigure.description: A popup message shown when the extension has been disconnected from KeePassXC.

popupNeedReconfigureMessage.description: A popup message shown when reconnect is needed.
popupNeedReconfigureMessage.message: Tekan tombol hubungkan kembali untuk membuat koneksi baru.

popupNotConfigured.description: A popup message shown when the extension has not been connected to KeePassXC.
popupNotConfigured.message: KeePassXC-Browser belum dikonfigurasi. Tekan tombol hubungkan untuk memasangkan dengan KeePassXC.

popupRedetectButton.description: Popup Redetect login fields button text.

popupURL.description: URL. Might not need any translation.

popupUpdateAvailable.description: Popup warning message about old version of KeePassXC.

popupUsername.description: A username field name shown on credential update.

popupUsernameButton.description: Button text for adding Username-only option.
popupUsernameButton.message: Tambah opsi hanya-nama-pengguna untuk situs ini

popupUsernameFieldDetected.description: Text shown when page can be added to Site Preferences with Username-only option enabled.
popupUsernameFieldDetected.message: Hanya ruas nama pengguna saja yang terdeteksi. Tambahkan URL ke Preferensi Situs hanya dengan nama pengguna saja?

rememberChooseCredentials.description: A message shown choosing what credentials user wants to update.
rememberChooseCredentials.message: Harap pilih kredensial yang ingin anda perbaharui

rememberChooseGroup.description: A message shown choosing what group user wants to use for new credentials.
rememberChooseGroup.message: Harap pilih grup yang ingin anda tambahkan kredensial baru.

rememberCredentialsExists.description: Message shown when new credentials already found in database.
rememberCredentialsExists.message: Kredensial identik sudah ada. Tidak ada yang perlu diperbarui.

rememberCredentialsNotSaved.description: Message shown when saving operation was cancelled.

rememberCredentialsSaved.description: Message shown when new credentials are saved.
rememberCredentialsSaved.message: Kredensial baru dengan nama pengguna $1 disimpan.

rememberCredentialsUpdated.description: Message shown when new credentials are succesfully updated.

rememberErrorCannotSaveCredentials.description: Error message shown when credentials cannot be saved or updated.
rememberErrorCannotSaveCredentials.message: Kredensial tidak bisa disimpan atau diperbarui.

rememberErrorCreatingNewGroup.description: Error message shown when new groups cannot be created.

rememberErrorDatabaseClosed.description: Error message shown when credentials cannot be saved or updated and the database is closed.
rememberErrorDatabaseClosed.message: Credentials cannot be saved or updated to a closed database.

rememberErrorPasswordNotChanged.description: Error message shown when credential password is not changed.
rememberErrorPasswordNotChanged.message: Kredensial tidak diperbarui. Sandi belum diubah.

rememberInfoDefaultGroupNotFound.description: Info message shown when default group set cannot be found.
rememberInfoDefaultGroupNotFound.message: Default group created in connected database.

rememberInfoText.description: Message when username or password has changed.
rememberInfoText.message: Nama pengguna atau kata sandi berubah! Simpan?

rememberNewUsername.description: A message shown when a new username is detected when saving credentials.
rememberNewUsername.message: Nama pengguna berikut saat ini belum disimpan: $1

rememberNoPassword.description: Message shown when no password is set when saving credentials.
rememberNoPassword.message: Silakan isi ruas sandi sebelum menyimpan kredensial.

rememberNothingChanged.description: Message shown when trying to save credentials that haven't changed.
rememberNothingChanged.message: Error: Tidak dapat mendeteksi perubahan kredensial.

rememberSaving.description: A message when saving or updating credentials.
rememberSaving.message: Kredensial akan disimpan dalam basis data yang terhubung dengan pengidentifikasi $1

rememberUsernameExists.description: A message shown when a existing username is detected when saving credentials.
rememberUsernameExists.message: Kredensial dengan nama pengguna yang telah ada ditandai dengan huruf tebal: $1

usernameDisconnectedFieldText.description: Username field icon hover text when KeePassXC is disconnected.

usernameLockedFieldText.description: Username field icon hover text when database is locked.
